text: Ntawe uzikorera umutwaro w’undi, kandi nihagira utabaza aremerewe n’ibyaha agira ngo yakirwe uwo mutwaro, nta na kimwe azakirwaho kabone n’iyo (azaba atabaje) abo bafitanye isano. Mu by’ukuri (yewe Muhamadi), uburira abatinya Nyagasani wabo batamubona ndetse bakanahozaho amasengesho. N’uwiyejeje (yitandukanya n’ibyaha byose), mu by’ukuri aba yiyejeje k’ubwe. Kandi kwa Allah ni ho byose bizasubira
